Articles.Content:
I always love coming up with with headcanon or lore for KSP. For example, my favorite bit of personal headcanon is that the Kraken is not inherently malevolent, but more just an agent of chaos (think Sheogorath from The Elder Scrolls). I just think the Kraken likes to toy with the kerbals every once in a while. A little spaghettification here, some  FTL travel there; ya know, the works.

So, I wanna know, what is your favorite personal bit of headcanon/lore?
